name: adaptdk/acquia-cloud-hooks
description: Template for hooks for acquia cloud.

scripts.post-install-cmd: sh -c '[ -d hooks ] && cp -r vendor/adaptdk/acquia-cloud-hooks hooks && rm -rf hooks/.git; echo "Created new hooks dir from vendors folder."'
scripts.post-update-cmd: sh -c '[ -d hooks ] && rm -rf hooks; cp -r vendor/adaptdk/acquia-cloud-hooks hooks && rm -rf hooks/.git; echo "Created new hooks dir from vendors folder."'
